name: Survival Maze
description: Survival and exploration, where the player will have to find a way out of the huge mysterious maze. Hero's vitality is limited, and on the way there are heterogeneous obstacles. To survive, you have to craft items from natural resources at hand (in the spirit of “robinzonadas”), as well as plan your movements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB  Video RAM Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
